title: Ron Paul’s international appeal
author: VD
content_html:
Even the British are beginning to notice him:

Ron Paul won’t win the GOP nomination. But it’s a rather delicious fantasy, isn’t it, worth indulging in for a few moments. Just think: a 2008 election contested by a pro-war Democrat and an anti-war Republican. Whom would the poor BBC back?

The answer, of course, is Hillary. Identity politics always trumps policies on the Left.
